## IEnumerableInputOption interface

Properties for each option for Enumerable inputs (radio buttons, checkboxes, dropdowns).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IEnumerableInputOption 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [title](./react-teams.ienumerableinputoption.title.md) | [TTextObject](./react-teams.ttextobject.md) | The option’s text content to display. |
|  [value](./react-teams.ienumerableinputoption.value.md) | string | The option’s value, which should be unique for the input in which it’s available. |
